ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Allow numbers to be presented in an English language version, one, two, three, ...  Ordinals are also available, first, second, third, ...
Allow numbers to be presented in an English language version, one, two, three, ...  Ordinals are also available, first, second, third, ...

name: r-english
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.2-6" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-english
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/english_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/english/english_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 49578a39b813d3497a960cb50a78d611fb367c9d1587bb438f4372748baf76bc

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('english')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('english')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=english
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  summary: Allow numbers to be presented in an English language version, one, two, three, ...  Ordinals are also available, first, second, third, ...
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - CurtLH

# Package: english
# Type: Package
# Title: Translate Integers into English
# Version: 1.2-3
# Date: 2019-03-16
# Author: John Fox, Bill Venables, Anthony Damico and Anne Pier Salverda
# Maintainer: Bill Venables <Bill.Venables@gmail.com>
# Description: Allow numbers to be presented in an English language version, one, two, three, ...  Ordinals are also available, first, second, third, ...
# Suggests: utils, knitr, rmarkdown
# License: GPL-2
# LazyLoad: yes
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Encoding: UTF-8
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.1
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# Packaged: 2019-03-23 06:11:28 UTC; bill
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-03-23 06:30:03 UTC
